original: 上黨銅鞮人，歷仕曹魏、西晉。被司馬懿辟為掾屬，晉代魏後頗得晉武帝重用，曾任東宮三師之一的太子太傅、尚書僕射。
text: Shangdang Tongdan people, Li Shi Cao Wei, Western Jin Dynasty. It was designated as a subordinate by Sima Yi, and was re-used by Emperor Wu of the Jin Dynasty after Wei in the Jin Dynasty. He once served as one of the three divisions of the East Palace, the prince Taifu and Shang Shupushang.
